Title: Requires the board of elections to check all registered voter's citizenship and lawful permanent resident status and requires all voters to show government issued identification to vote
Summary: Requires the board of elections to check all registered voter's citizenship and lawful permanent resident status; requires all voters to show government issued identification to vote.
LawCode: Add ยง5-714, amd ยง8-303, El L; amd ยง491, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law and the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring the board of elections to check all registered voter's citizenship and lawful permanent resident status and requires showing government issued identification to vote
